body_html:
@asimshankar You could try replacing lines 172-173 in c_api_test.cc with:

TFE_TensorHandle* hdevice =
  TFE_TensorHandleCopyToDevice(hcpu, ctx, "/device:CPU:0", status.get());

This should give you an error that says:

W tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device_mgr.cc:94] Unknown device: /device:CPU:0 all devices: CPU:0, /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0, /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0
body:
@asimshankar You could try replacing [lines 172-173 in c_api_test.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/1a0a160cb9993b30abe1d1451dcaeb5d277a11f4/tensorflow/c/eager/c_api_test.cc#L172) with:
```
TFE_TensorHandle* hdevice =
  TFE_TensorHandleCopyToDevice(hcpu, ctx, "/device:CPU:0", status.get());
```
This should give you an error that says:
```
W tensorflow/core/common_runtime/device_mgr.cc:94] Unknown device: /device:CPU:0 all devices: CPU:0, /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0, /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0
```
